summary: DOOR AJAR LIGHT KEEPS COMING ON. FORD FIXED AT AROUND 38,000 MILES NOW IT HAS COME BACK. I WAS TOLD THEY WOULD DO THE CHEAP FIX AND IT WOULD RETURN AND THAT HAS BEEN THE CASE NOW I AM OUT OF WARRANTY. FORD THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE AND SHOULD BE A RECALL. IF THE DOME LIGHT STAYS ON AT NIGHT OR DOORS WONT LOCK THIS IS A HUGE LIABILITY. ALSO ITS SETS OFF THE ALARM AND DRAINS MY BATTERY.
